Weather App

Simple weather app that displays the weather details of the user searched location, uses the weather API and giphy API to get the weather information and weather related gif respectively. part of The Odin Project curriculum.

Tshwane University of Technology is the largest residential higher education institution in South Africa.
The Electrical Engineering programme is the study and application of electricity, electronics and electromagnetism. Electrical Engineers study the uses of electricity and equipment for power generation and distribution.

Ekurhuleni West (TVET) College (EWC) is a Technical and Vocational Education and Training College.
The Electrical field of study consists of two main fields, namely: Electrical Heavy Current and Light Current (also known as “Electronics”).
Electricians are involved in the generation, installation, distribution and usage of electricity via electrically-operated equipment, e.g. domestic installation.
